name: eAhoy.com
tag_list: ecommerce, shopping, coupons, deals, marketplace, community, geotargeted, websites, online-store
overview:
eAhoy.com provides a versatile marketplace shopping experience with one-stop local convenience, free geo-targeted marketing for sellers and a powerful partner program.

eAhoy is a hub for shopping, selling, classified ads, community events, activities, and social networking â€“ serving the daily needs of everyone. The eAhoy open marketplace replaces the need to visit multiple websites for everyday solutions.

eAhoy provides a complete toolbox for small business owners, entrepreneurs, and individual sellers to conduct business in a competitive global market by providing a platform to compare - and beat - prices with name brand stores.

Users can create an instant online presence, shop local or global deals and coupons, sell products or services, build or expand their businesses, and participate in the growing trend of social commerce.
